bio: I am a brewer. In the last 2 years I began to dive into cryptocurrency. This got me very interested and I want to know a lot of information on this topic.
contributionDescription: I am a holder of optimism tokens. I constantly participate in voting because I want to help in choosing the best path for optimism. Since Iâ€™m interested in the future of the project, I follow the news and updates. I tell my friends about optimism and how important this project is for the Ethereum network. In the past I participated in quests.

contributionLinks.description: On my Twitter I follow the project and retweet

impactDescription: participation in voting, which I think everyone should have. Testing bridges in the network optimism clearly has a positive impact on the Optimism Collective. With my help, two new people appeared in the optimism community, which increases the number of users.

fundingSources.description: reward for holding and participation in voting
